name: gimme-gif
description: This project is bootstrapped with [Create Elm App](https://github.com/halfzebra/create-elm-app).

scripts.build: elm-app build && cp src/*.{ico,json} dist/ && sw-precache --root=dist --static-file-globs='dist/**/*.*'
